On tis, 2009-02-24 at 15:30 +0100, Fredrik Wendt wrote:
> On tis, 2009-02-24 at 12:45 +0000, majkic@... wrote:
> > WOW. I'm really impressed with seriousness you approached to
> > acceptance testing.

Missed one word here: we do UI testing. We can't cover more than 30 % of
domain logic through the UI. The application is also really configurable
so what we've settled on is a typical standard configuration that
exposes as much as possible while still making sense/being realistic.

I'd also look at Story IQ (stiq) and see if that meets your needs.

/
	Fredrik Wendt
